name: Impale
script:
if ak.ai() then return end
if matches[2] and IsTargetted(matches[2]) then
   affstrack.impale = "Me"
   ak.scoreup(matches[2])
elseif not matches[2] then
   affstrack.impale = "Me"
   ak.scoreup(target)
end
matches: ^You draw your blade back and plunge it deep into the body of ([\w'\-]+) impaling [\w'\-]+ to the hilt\.$
You cannot do that while your weapon remains deep in your victim's gut.
